{"type":"user","message":{"role":"user","content":[{"tool_use_id":"call_2mmo716el7h","type":"tool_result","content":"     1→
     2→'use client'
     3→import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'
     4→import { Card, CardContent, CardHeader, CardTitle } from './ui/card'
     5→import { Button } from './ui/button'
     6→import { Input } from './ui/input'
     7→import { formatDate, generateId } from '@/lib/utils'
     8→
     9→interface Task {
    10→  id: string
    11→  title: string
    12→  description: string
    13→  completed: boolean
    14→  priority: 'low' | 'medium' | 'high'
    15→  createdAt: Date
    16→  dueDate?: Date
    17→}
    18→
    19→export function TaskManager() {
    20→  const [tasks, setTasks] = useState<Task[]>([])
    21→  const [newTask, setNewTask] = useState({ title: '', description: '', priority: 'medium' as const })
    22→  const [filter, setFilter] = useState<'all' | 'active' | 'completed'>('all')
    23→
    24→  useEffect(() => {
    25→    const savedTasks = localStorage.getItem('tasks')
    26→    if (savedTasks) {
    27→      setTasks(JSON.parse(savedTasks).map((task: any) => ({
    28→        ...task,
    29→        createdAt: new Date(task.createdAt),
    30→        dueDate: task.dueDate ? new Date(task.dueDate) : undefined
    31→      })))
    32→    }
    33→  }, [])
    34→
    35→  useEffect(() => {
    36→    localStorage.setItem('tasks', JSON.stringify(tasks))
    37→  }, [tasks])
    38→
    39→  const addTask = () => {
    40→    if (!newTask.title.trim()) return
    41→    const task: Task = {
    42→      id: generateId(),
    43→      title: newTask.title,
    44→      description: newTask.description,
    45→      priority: newTask.priority,
    46→      completed: false,
    47→      createdAt: new Date()
    48→    }
    49→    setTasks(prev => [...prev, task])
    50→    setNewTask({ title: '', description: '', priority: 'medium' })
    51→  }
    52→
    53→  const toggleTask = (id: string) => {
    54→    setTasks(prev => prev.map(task =>
    55→      task.id === id ? { ...task, completed: !task.completed } : task
    56→    ))
    57→  }
    58→
    59→  const deleteTask = (id: string) => {
    60→    setTasks(prev => prev.filter(task => task.id !== id))
    61→  }
    62→
    63→  const filteredTasks = tasks.filter(task => {
    64→    if (filter === 'active') return !task.completed
    65→    if (filter === 'completed') return task.completed
    66→    return true
    67→  })
    68→
    69→  return (
    70→    <div className="max-w-4xl mx-auto p-6 space-y-6">
    71→      <Card>
    72→        <CardHeader>
    73→          <CardTitle>Add New Task</CardTitle>
    74→        </CardHeader>
    75→        <CardContent className="space-y-4">
    76→          <Input
    77→            placeholder="Task title..."
    78→            value={newTask.title}
    79→            onChange={(e) => setNewTask(prev => ({ ...prev, title: e.target.value }))}
    80→          />
    81→          <Input
    82→            placeholder="Task description..."
    83→            value={newTask.description}
    84→            onChange={(e) => setNewTask(prev => ({ ...prev, description: e.target.value }))}
    85→          />
    86→          <select
    87→            value={newTask.priority}
    88→            onChange={(e) => setNewTask(prev => ({ ...prev, priority: e.target.value as any }))}
    89→            className="flex h-10 w-full rounded-md border border-input bg-background px-3 py-2 text-sm"
    90→          >
    91→            <option value="low">Low Priority</option>
    92→            <option value="medium">Medium Priority</option>
    93→            <option value="high">High Priority</option>
    94→          </select>
    95→          <Button onClick={addTask}>Add Task</Button>
    96→        </CardContent>
    97→      </Card>
    98→      <div className="flex gap-2 mb-4">
    99→        <Button variant={filter === 'all' ? 'default' : 'outline'} onClick={() => setFilter('all')}>
   100→          All ({tasks.length})
   101→        </Button>
   102→        <Button variant={filter === 'active' ? 'default' : 'outline'} onClick={() => setFilter('active')}>
   103→          Active ({tasks.filter(t => !t.completed).length})
   104→        </Button>
   105→        <Button variant={filter === 'completed' ? 'default' : 'outline'} onClick={() => setFilter('completed')}>
   106→          Completed ({tasks.filter(t => t.completed).length})
   107→        </Button>
   108→      </div>
   109→      <div className="space-y-4">
   110→        {filteredTasks.map(task => (
   111→          <Card key={task.id} className={task.completed ? 'opacity-60' : ''}>
   112→            <CardContent className="p-4">
   113→              <div className="flex items-start justify-between">
   114→                <div className="flex-1">
   115→                  <h3 className={`font-medium ${task.completed ? 'line-through' : ''}`}>
   116→                    {task.title}
   117→                  </h3>
   118→                  {task.description && (
   119→                    <p className="text-sm text-muted-foreground mt-1">
   120→                      {task.description}
   121→                    </p>
   122→                  )}
   123→                  <div className="flex items-center gap-4 mt-2 text-xs text-muted-foreground">
   124→                    <span>Priority: {task.priority}</span>
   125→                    <span>Created: {formatDate(task.createdAt)}</span>
   126→                  </div>
   127→                </div>
   128→                <div className="flex gap-2">
   129→                  <Button
   130→                    variant="outline"
   131→                    size="sm"
   132→                    onClick={() => toggleTask(task.id)}
   133→                  >
   134→                    {task.completed ? 'Undo' : 'Complete'}
   135→                  </Button>
   136→                  <Button
   137→                    variant="destructive"
   138→                    size="sm"
   139→                    onClick={() => deleteTask(task.id)}
   140→                  >
   141→                    Delete
   142→                  </Button>
   143→                </div>
   144→              </div>
   145→            </CardContent>
   146→          </Card>
   147→        ))}
   148→      </div>
   149→    </div>
   150→  )
   151→}
   152→export default TaskManager
   153→

{"type":"user","message":{"role":"user","content":[{"tool_use_id":"call_5pv65f8stji","type":"tool_result","content":"     1→
     2→'use client'
     3→import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'
     4→import { Card, CardContent, CardHeader, CardTitle } from './ui/card'
     5→import { Button } from './ui/button'
     6→import { Input } from './ui/input'
     7→import { formatDate, generateId } from '@/lib/utils'
     8→
     9→interface Task {
    10→  id: string
    11→  title: string
    12→  description: string
    13→  completed: boolean
    14→  priority: 'low' | 'medium' | 'high'
    15→  createdAt: Date
    16→  dueDate?: Date
    17→}
    18→
    19→export function TaskManager() {
    20→  const [tasks, setTasks] = useState<Task[]>([])
    21→  const [newTask, setNewTask] = useState({ title: '', description: '', priority: 'medium' as const })
    22→  const [filter, setFilter] = useState<'all' | 'active' | 'completed'>('all')
    23→
    24→  useEffect(() => {
    25→    const savedTasks = localStorage.getItem('tasks')
    26→    if (savedTasks) {
    27→      setTasks(JSON.parse(savedTasks).map((task: any) => ({
    28→        ...task,
    29→        createdAt: new Date(task.createdAt),
    30→        dueDate: task.dueDate ? new Date(task.dueDate) : undefined
    31→      })))
    32→    }
    33→  }, [])
    34→
    35→  useEffect(() => {
    36→    localStorage.setItem('tasks', JSON.stringify(tasks))
    37→  }, [tasks])
    38→
    39→  const addTask = () => {
    40→    if (!newTask.title.trim()) return
    41→    const task: Task = {
    42→      id: generateId(),
    43→      title: newTask.title,
    44→      description: newTask.description,
    45→      priority: newTask.priority,
    46→      completed: false,
    47→      createdAt: new Date()
    48→    }
    49→    setTasks(prev => [...prev, task])
    50→    setNewTask({ title: '', description: '', priority: 'medium' })
    51→  }
    52→
    53→  const toggleTask = (id: string) => {
    54→    setTasks(prev => prev.map(task =>
    55→      task.id === id ? { ...task, completed: !task.completed } : task
    56→    ))
    57→  }
    58→
    59→  const deleteTask = (id: string) => {
    60→    setTasks(prev => prev.filter(task => task.id !== id))
    61→  }
    62→
    63→  const filteredTasks = tasks.filter(task => {
    64→    if (filter === 'active') return !task.completed
    65→    if (filter === 'completed') return task.completed
    66→    return true
    67→  })
    68→
    69→  return (
    70→    <div className="max-w-4xl mx-auto p-6 space-y-6">
    71→      <Card>
    72→        <CardHeader>
    73→          <CardTitle>Add New Task</CardTitle>
    74→        </CardHeader>
    75→        <CardContent className="space-y-4">
    76→          <Input
    77→            placeholder="Task title..."
    78→            value={newTask.title}
    79→            onChange={(e) => setNewTask(prev => ({ ...prev, title: e.target.value }))}
    80→          />
    81→          <Input
    82→            placeholder="Task description..."
    83→            value={newTask.description}
    84→            onChange={(e) => setNewTask(prev => ({ ...prev, description: e.target.value }))}
    85→          />
    86→          <select
    87→            value={newTask.priority}
    88→            onChange={(e) => setNewTask(prev => ({ ...prev, priority: e.target.value as any }))}
    89→            className="flex h-10 w-full rounded-md border border-input bg-background px-3 py-2 text-sm"
    90→          >
    91→            <option value="low">Low Priority</option>
    92→            <option value="medium">Medium Priority</option>
    93→            <option value="high">High Priority</option>
    94→          </select>
    95→          <Button onClick={addTask}>Add Task</Button>
    96→        </CardContent>
    97→      </Card>
    98→      <div className="flex gap-2 mb-4">
    99→        <Button variant={filter === 'all' ? 'default' : 'outline'} onClick={() => setFilter('all')}>
   100→          All ({tasks.length})
   101→        </Button>
   102→        <Button variant={filter === 'active' ? 'default' : 'outline'} onClick={() => setFilter('active')}>
   103→          Active ({tasks.filter(t => !t.completed).length})
   104→        </Button>
   105→        <Button variant={filter === 'completed' ? 'default' : 'outline'} onClick={() => setFilter('completed')}>
   106→          Completed ({tasks.filter(t => t.completed).length})
   107→        </Button>
   108→      </div>
   109→      <div className="space-y-4">
   110→        {filteredTasks.map(task => (
   111→          <Card key={task.id} className={task.completed ? 'opacity-60' : ''}>
   112→            <CardContent className="p-4">
   113→              <div className="flex items-start justify-between">
   114→                <div className="flex-1">
   115→                  <h3 className={`font-medium ${task.completed ? 'line-through' : ''}`}>
   116→                    {task.title}
   117→                  </h3>
   118→                  {task.description && (
   119→                    <p className="text-sm text-muted-foreground mt-1">
   120→                      {task.description}
   121→                    </p>
   122→                  )}
   123→                  <div className="flex items-center gap-4 mt-2 text-xs text-muted-foreground">
   124→                    <span>Priority: {task.priority}</span>
   125→                    <span>Created: {formatDate(task.createdAt)}</span>
   126→                  </div>
   127→                </div>
   128→                <div className="flex gap-2">
   129→                  <Button
   130→                    variant="outline"
   131→                    size="sm"
   132→                    onClick={() => toggleTask(task.id)}
   133→                  >
   134→                    {task.completed ? 'Undo' : 'Complete'}
   135→                  </Button>
   136→                  <Button
   137→                    variant="destructive"
   138→                    size="sm"
   139→                    onClick={() => deleteTask(task.id)}
   140→                  >
   141→                    Delete
   142→                  </Button>
   143→                </div>
   144→              </div>
   145→            </CardContent>
   146→          </Card>
   147→        ))}
   148→      </div>
   149→    </div>
   150→  )
   151→}
   152→export default TaskManager
   153→

**Current Pattern**:

      ...task,

export function useLocalStorage<T>(key: string, initialValue: T) {
  const [storedValue, setStoredValue] = useState<T>(initialValue);

  useEffect(() => {
    try {
      const item = window.localStorage.getItem(key);
      if (item) {
        const parsed = JSON.parse(item);
        setStoredValue(parsed);
      }
    } catch (error) {
      console.error(`Error reading localStorage key "${key}":`, error);
    }
  }, [key]);

  const setValue = (value: T | ((val: T) => T)) => {
    try {
      const valueToStore = value instanceof Function ? value(storedValue) : value;
      setStoredValue(valueToStore);
      window.localStorage.setItem(key, JSON.stringify(valueToStore));
    } catch (error) {
      console.error(`Error setting localStorage key "${key}":`, error);
    }
  };

  return [storedValue, setValue] as const;
}"}}],"stop_reason":null,"stop_sequence":null,"usage":{"input_tokens":105,"output_tokens":405,"cache_read_input_tokens":28184}},"parent_tool_use_id":null,"session_id":"49612328-bf7c-47f1-a142-fdf21387c2f1","uuid":"e6fc7a17-2c80-4a6d-9109-9487e90ed972"}

export interface Task {
  id: string;
  title: string;
  description: string;
  priority: 'low' | 'medium' | 'high';
  completed: boolean;
  createdAt: Date;
  dueDate?: Date;
}

export function useTaskOperations(initialTasks: Task[] = []) {
  const [tasks, setTasks] = useState<Task[]>(initialTasks);

  const addTask = (taskData: Omit<Task, 'id' | 'completed' | 'createdAt'>) => {
    const newTask: Task = {
      ...taskData,
      id: crypto.randomUUID(),
      completed: false,
      createdAt: new Date()
    };
    setTasks(prev => [...prev, newTask]);
  };

  const toggleTask = (id: string) => {
    setTasks(prev => prev.map(task =>
      task.id === id ? { ...task, completed: !task.completed } : task
    ));
  };

  const deleteTask = (id: string) => {
    setTasks(prev => prev.filter(task => task.id !== id));
  };

  const updateTask = (id: string, updates: Partial<Task>) => {
    setTasks(prev => prev.map(task =>
      task.id === id ? { ...task, ...updates } : task
    ));
  };

  const getTaskCounts = () => ({
    total: tasks.length,
    active: tasks.filter(t => !t.completed).length,
    completed: tasks.filter(t => t.completed).length
  });

  return {
    tasks,
    addTask,
    toggleTask,
    deleteTask,
    updateTask,
    getTaskCounts,
    setTasks
  };
}"}}],"stop_reason":null,"stop_sequence":null,"usage":{"input_tokens":0,"output_tokens":0}},"parent_tool_use_id":null,"session_id":"49612328-bf7c-47f1-a142-fdf21387c2f1","uuid":"40b12ebf-bd5f-42d8-8ee8-f01d397d9588"}

export interface UseFormStateReturn<T> {
  state: T;
  setState: React.Dispatch<React.SetStateAction<T>>;
  handleChange: (field: keyof T, value: any) => void;
  reset: () => void;
}

export function useFormState<T>(initialState: T): UseFormStateReturn<T> {
  const [state, setState] = useState<T>(initialState);

  const handleChange = (field: keyof T, value: any) => {
    setState(prev => ({
      ...prev,
      [field]: value
    }));
  };

  const reset = () => {
    setState(initialState);
  };

  return {
    state,
    setState,
    handleChange,
    reset
  };

import React, { Component, ReactNode } from 'react';

interface Props {
  children: ReactNode;
  fallback?: ReactNode;
}

interface State {
  hasError: boolean;
  error?: Error;
}

export class ErrorBoundary extends Component<Props, State> {
  constructor(props: Props) {
    super(props);
    this.state = { hasError: false };
  }

  static getDerivedStateFromError(error: Error): State {
    return { hasError: true, error };
  }

  componentDidCatch(error: Error, errorInfo: React.ErrorInfo) {
    console.error('ErrorBoundary caught an error:', error, errorInfo);
  }

  render() {
    if (this.state.hasError) {
      if (this.props.fallback) {
        return this.props.fallback;
      }

      return (
        <div className="p-4 border border-red-300 bg-red-50 rounded-lg">
          <h2 className="text-lg font-semibold text-red-800 mb-2">Something went wrong</h2>
          <p className="text-red-600 text-sm">
            {this.state.error?.message || 'An unexpected error occurred'}
          </p>
        </div>
      );
    }

    return this.props.children;
  }

import React, { useState } from 'react'
import { Card, CardContent, CardHeader, CardTitle } from './ui/card'
import { Button } from './ui/button'
import { Input } from './ui/input'
import { formatDate } from '@/lib/utils'
import { STRINGS } from '@/lib/constants'
import { useLocalStorage } from '@/hooks/useLocalStorage'
import { useTaskOperations, Task } from '@/hooks/useTaskOperations'
import { useFormState } from '@/hooks/useFormState'
import { useFilter } from '@/hooks/useFilter'
import { ErrorBoundary } from './ErrorBoundary'

export function TaskManager() {
  const [tasks, setTasks] = useLocalStorage<Task[]>('tasks', [])
  const [filter, setFilter] = useState<'all' | 'active' | 'completed'>('all')

  const { state: newTask, handleChange, reset } = useFormState({
    title: '',
    description: '',
    priority: 'medium' as const
  })

  const { addTask, toggleTask, deleteTask, getTaskCounts } = useTaskOperations(tasks)

  const filteredTasks = useFilter(
    tasks,
    filter,
    (task, type) => {
      if (type === 'active') return !task.completed
      if (type === 'completed') return task.completed
      return true
    }
  )

  const handleAddTask = () => {
    if (!newTask.title.trim()) return

    addTask({
      title: newTask.title,
      description: newTask.description,
      priority: newTask.priority
    })

    reset()
  }

  const counts = getTaskCounts()

  return (
    <ErrorBoundary>
      <div className="max-w-4xl mx-auto p-6 space-y-6">
        <Card>
          <CardHeader>
            <CardTitle>{STRINGS.FORM.TITLE}</CardTitle>
          </CardHeader>
          <CardContent className="space-y-4">
            <Input
              placeholder={STRINGS.FORM.TITLE_PLACEHOLDER}
              value={newTask.title}
              onChange={(e) => handleChange('title', e.target.value)}
            />
            <Input
              placeholder={STRINGS.FORM.DESCRIPTION_PLACEHOLDER}
              value={newTask.description}
              onChange={(e) => handleChange('description', e.target.value)}
            />
            <select
              value={newTask.priority}
              onChange={(e) => handleChange('priority', e.target.value as any)}
              className="flex h-10 w-full rounded-md border border-input bg-background px-3 py-2 text-sm"
            >
              <option value="low">{STRINGS.FORM.PRIORITY_OPTIONS.LOW}</option>
              <option value="medium">{STRINGS.FORM.PRIORITY_OPTIONS.MEDIUM}</option>
              <option value="high">{STRINGS.FORM.PRIORITY_OPTIONS.HIGH}</option>
            </select>
            <Button onClick={handleAddTask}>{STRINGS.FORM.ADD_BUTTON}</Button>
          </CardContent>
        </Card>

        <div className="flex gap-2 mb-4">
          <Button variant={filter === 'all' ? 'default' : 'outline'} onClick={() => setFilter('all')}>
            {STRINGS.FILTER.ALL} ({counts.total})
          </Button>
          <Button variant={filter === 'active' ? 'default' : 'outline'} onClick={() => setFilter('active')}>
            {STRINGS.FILTER.ACTIVE} ({counts.active})
          </Button>
          <Button variant={filter === 'completed' ? 'default' : 'outline'} onClick={() => setFilter('completed')}>
            {STRINGS.FILTER.COMPLETED} ({counts.completed})
          </Button>
        </div>

        <div className="space-y-4">
          {filteredTasks.map(task => (
            <ErrorBoundary key={task.id} fallback={<div className="text-red-500">Error rendering task</div>}>
              <Card className={task.completed ? 'opacity-60' : ''}>
                <CardContent className="p-4">
                  <div className="flex items-start justify-between">
                    <div className="flex-1">
                      <h3 className={`font-medium ${task.completed ? 'line-through' : ''}`}>
                        {task.title}
                      </h3>
                      {task.description && (
                        <p className="text-sm text-muted-foreground mt-1">
                          {task.description}
                        </p>
                      )}
                      <div className="flex items-center gap-4 mt-2 text-xs text-muted-foreground">
                        <span>{STRINGS.TASK.PRIORITY_LABEL}{task.priority}</span>
                        <span>{STRINGS.TASK.CREATED_LABEL}{formatDate(task.createdAt)}</span>
                      </div>
                    </div>
                    <div className="flex gap-2">
                      <Button
                        variant="outline"
                        size="sm"
                        onClick={() => toggleTask(task.id)}
                      >
                        {task.completed ? STRINGS.TASK.UNDO_BUTTON : STRINGS.TASK.COMPLETE_BUTTON}
                      </Button>
                      <Button
                        variant="destructive"
                        size="sm"
                        onClick={() => deleteTask(task.id)}
                      >
                        {STRINGS.TASK.DELETE_BUTTON}
                      </Button>
                    </div>
                  </div>
                </CardContent>
              </Card>
            </ErrorBoundary>
          ))}
        </div>
      </div>
    </ErrorBoundary>
  )
}

export default TaskManager"}}],"stop_reason":"tool_use","stop_sequence":null,"usage":{"input_tokens":3182,"output_tokens":1865,"cache_read_input_tokens":30797}},"parent_tool_use_id":null,"session_id":"49612328-bf7c-47f1-a142-fdf21387c2f1","uuid":"5e623478-11f0-4641-98be-f5e233d0773f"}
